transcript: just a very clear like big dick move I wanted acquisition.com and so I sent Layla an email which I never do because I don't check email and I don't send emails I made this huge case for why we should buy marketing.com if you guys want it it's on sale for 5.6 million but I was like I think we should get this I think it's going to be worth it the recognition I can walk on stage and we'd be like oh this guy's marketing.com it's just a very clear like big dick move and if you absolutely hate it we can do acquisition.com for 400 Grand and she's like well that doesn't sound so bad that was how it was not calm ended up getting
